page.title: 18MY HOME TOWN
page.content:
I live in a street called{Thaxted Way, in Waltham Abbey. It is very quiet and still in our street, and there are lots of{trees. In the centre of the town, there is a {Town Hall,}and at the side of the building there is a{river}where we go {fishing.}Last weekend my dad took Sarah, Rebecca, and myself fishing. We caught 10 small fish, which we took home and put into our pond. In Waltham Abbey there are only a few {shops,}the council should build a large{supermarket}in the town.
Child aged 10.
